Name: Take dimensions off drawings & record remarks/deviations
Tag 1: Take dimensions off drawings and record any remarks / deviations prior to installing

Name: Set Out
Tag 1: Take dimensions off drawings and record any remarks / deviations prior to installing

Name: Photo of title block to incl. drawing no. & revision
Tag 1: Photo of title block to include drawing number & revision

Name: No structural effect with penetration/cast in pos.
Tag 1: Consult structural drawings to ensure no structural effect with penetration or cast in position

Name: Pipework within set downs & beams are cast in/out
Tag 1: Ensure pipework within set downs and beams are cast in/out of set downs where required and indicated on penetration drawings

Name: Penetration does not clash with elements downstairs
Tag 1: Check that penetration does not clash with elements downstairs e.g. Walls, Beams ETC

Name: Fire collar installed as per manufacturer's specs.
Tag 1: Ensure that fire collar is installed as per manufacturer's specifications and is spatially acceptable

Name: Fire Collar Type
Tag 1: Ensure that fire collar is installed as per manufacturer's specifications and is spatially acceptable

Name: Pipe fitted correctly
Tag 1: Ensure pipe is fitted correctly

Name: Pipe fitted to maximise efficiency of next work sequence
Tag 1: Ensure pipe is fitted to maximise the efficiency of the next sequence of work e.g. Pipe is easy to knock through

Name: Conduit within wall/carcass range
Tag 1: Ensure conduit is within wall or carcass range

Name: Use 15/45 degree bends on all changes in direction
Tag 1: Use 15/45 degree bends on all changes in direction

Name: Pipe supported correctly without affecting balcony soffit
Tag 1: Ensure pipe is supported correctly without affecting balcony soffit

Name: Pipes not damaged after top steel & set downs installed
Tag 1: Ensure pipes are not damaged after top steel and set downs are installed.

Name: Safewaste/puddle flange installed to all req. outlets
Tag 1: Ensure safewaste or puddle flange is installed to all required outlets

Name: Safewaste/puddle flange installed to correct height
Tag 1: Ensure safewaste or puddle flange is installed to the correct height

Name: Spray all floor wastes to identify falls
Tag 1: Spray all floor wastes to identify falls

Name: No open ends by installing dust cap/duct tape on risers
Tag 1: Ensure no open ends by installing dust cap or duct tape on risers

Name: All sleeves installed in in situ walls at correct height
Tag 1: Ensure all sleeves installed in in situ walls at the correct height

Name: Pipes clear of any obstructions prior to extending riser
Tag 1: Ensure pipes are clear of any obstructions prior to extending riser

Name: Pipe fitted correctly where agreed by structural eng.
Tag 1: Ensure pipe is fitted correctly where agreed by structural engineer

Name: Pipes wrapped where required
Tag 1: Ensure pipes are wrapped where required

Name: Downpipes capped & taped to riser
Tag 1: Ensure downpipes capped and taped to riser

Name: Pipe is filled with water for concrete pour where req.
Tag 1: Ensure pipe is filled with water for concrete pour where required

Name: All required inspections by third parties
Tag 1: Complete all required inspections by third parties (client, authorities, builder, etc)

Name: Photos taken of entire installation
Tag 1: Ensure photos are taken of entire installation inc fire collars and casting prior to concrete pour
